coded_answer.p: ImI'm very excited because I won the first prize and my family is very proud of me.

aboutAbout the things you asked me in your letter, I would like to go to camp California onin julyJuly because that's the month when I go out from schoolterm ends and I have my vacations and I think it would be much easier that month. About my acommodationsaccommodation inat the camp, I would prefer to stay in a log cabin because it's safer than being in a tent and because you sleep more confortablecomfortablecomfortably. The activities that I would like to do are signingsinging, because my friend told me that imI'm good at it., and the other activitieactivity that I would like to do is climbing because I thingthink it is very exciting although I have never tried climbing., because in my city there are no mountainsthere are no mountains in my city.
I just want to ask you forabout something else. How many jeans, Pants, sweatersweaters etc... do I have to take? andAnd how much money woulddo I need to bring in my pocket?
I appreciate thatthe opportunitiopportunity that you are giving to me and ImI'm very thankfulgrateful to you guys.

Dear Kim ImI'm having a great time here in brazilBrazil, I have been going out with some friends anand now I have a girlfriend. ShesShe's very nice and very Pretty too., Well on march 11th there was a group here in brazil namedcalled "Los Jagoares", they sing pop music. andAnd itsit'sthey are one of my favoritesfavourites and as you know I have a cousin that works as aan organizer for all the bands that would like to have a concert in brazilBrazil and when my cousin knew that my favoritefavourite band was coming he called me and toldasked me that if I would like to help them to install the speakers, microphones etc... and I said, "sureman".Sure man." That night I went to the stadium and I met the singer his. His name is saul Herna√±dez and he is very funny that. That night I had a lot of fun with them and of course I was onin the first linerow inat the concert. It was the best day of my life. I hope you are having fun and that you are OK. Your friend Henrique.
